name: World Serpent (itch)
description:
Play as a giant snake monster eating everything in its way! The more you eat the longer you become until you end up covering enough of the planet to run into your own tale.

Gameplay

Fast paced snake-like game in a 3D space where you objective is to eat up as many things as you can. Each stage is a planet or some type of megastructure filled with monsters and destructable environment. Some of more unique mechanics different gravity physics of each stage and ability to jump to avoid running into own tale.

Eating things award you with points that will unlock more content as you play - new planets and other space objects.

Use arrow keys or [A, D] to turn to side.
SPACE to jump.

The game is still work in progress!

Now also available on steam!
